segments.text: Ms . : Do you have a question , Mary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . That's not why I raised my hand . I need to go to the ladies ' room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ms . : Let me give you a hall pass for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ms . : With a hall pass , you can go to the ladies ' room or wherever you need to go during class time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ms . : If a teacher stops you in the hallway , just show him or her the pass .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Or else I'll get into trouble .
segments.speaker: S2
